title: feat: upgrade TTS from eleven_multilingual_v2 to eleven_v3
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Upgraded the Text-to-Speech engine to ElevenLabs v3, unlocking emotive speech and broader language support.
gist.impact: Creators can now generate expressive audio with tags for laughter or crying, access over 70 languages, and produce multi-speaker dialogue.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing headphones and speaking into a retro microphone, with colorful sound waves forming emotional icons like happy faces and tears. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley meets a recording studio. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
